Name: Moss Mech Shard
Description: Used for refining equipment parts. Increases the success rate of refinement and is compatible with other Mech Shards. A greater quantity can be added during refinement to raise the success rate cap. It is more effective and also more valuable.

Description2$english: A specially processed metal sheet of Bapharian Legacy, it is the crystallization of advanced theories and technologies of heritage experts.
